title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3742/92 of 23 December 1992 ending the charges against the reference bases established for 1992 in the framework of generalized tariff preferences by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 in respect of certain industrial products originating in Poland
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3742/92  of 23 December 1992  ending the charges against the reference bases established for 1992 in the framework of generalized tariff preferences by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 in respect of certain  industrial products originating in Poland
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The quantities charged against the reference base established for 1992 by Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 relating to the product indicated in the table below and originating in Poland, shall cease to be allowed from 27 December 1992:
CN code  Description     2933 71 00  6-Hexanelactam (epsilon-caprolactam)

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1992. For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No l 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 341, 12. 12. 1991, p. 1. Regulation last amended by Council Regulation (EEC) No 1509/92 (OJ No L 159, 12. 6. 1992, p. 1). (3) OJ No L 159, 12. 6. 1992, p. 1.
